text: Nino Kirtadze (; born 1 June 1968) is a Georgian-born French journalist, actress and film director. Since 1997 she has lived in France. She starred in the 1996 film A Chef in Love as well as the 2008 film The Rainbowmaker. She directed the 2014 film Don't Breathe. ==External links== * *Nino Kirtadze on Georgian National Filmography Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Film directors from Georgia (country) Category:Women film directors from Georgia (country) Category:20th-century actresses from Georgia (country) Category:21st-century actresses from Georgia (country)
title: Nino Kirtadze
